Interface Capable

All Known Implementing Classes:
Actor, Ally, AxeOfGodrick, Barrack, Bug, Cage, CapabilitySet, Charizard, Cliff, Club, Crater, Dirt, Dog, Dragon, Enemy, FingerReaderEnia, FireWorm, FlamingSword, FlaskOfCrimsonTears, Floor, Floor, Floor, GiantCrab, GiantCrabPincer, GiantCrayfish, GiantCrayfishPincer, GiantDog, GiantDogHead, GodrickSoldier, GoldenFogDoor, GoldenRune, GraftedDragon, Graveyard, GreatKnife, Grossmesser, Ground, GustOfWind, HeavySkeletalSwordsman, Invader, Item, LockedDoor, LoneWolf, MartianItem, MerchantKale, PileOfBones, Player, Player, Player, PuddleOfWater, RemembranceOfTheGrafted, Rune, Scimitar, SiteOfLostGrace, SkeletalBandit, Slug, Stick, SummonSign, Tree, Uchigatana, Volcano, Wall, Wall, WeaponItem
public interface Capable
An interface for representing a collection of any kind of enum. A practical alternative to type introspection and other problems.
